name: Artichoke Dip
ingredients: 1 C. Parmesan cheese, grated 1 (8 ½ oz.) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 C. Mayonnaise ½ C. Monterey Jack cheese, grated
1 (4-­‐oz.) Can chopped green chilies Dash of Tabasco sauce or cayenne pepper
steps: Spread in baking dish and sprinkle with Monterey cheese.
Mix Parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, chilies, garlic, artichokes and tabasco together.
Bake 20 minutes. Serve warm with tortilla chips, crackers or bread.
